title: Is Microsoft Corp (MSFT) Stock a Smart Value?
text:
Microsoft Corp (MSFT) stock is up 58.10% over the last 12 months, and the average rating from Wall Street analysts is a Strong Buy. InvestorsObserver’s proprietary ranking system, gives MSFT stock a score of  73 out of a possible 100. 





That rank is chiefly influenced by a short-term technical score of 93. MSFT's rank also includes a long-term technical score of 80. 






 MSFT has an Overall Score of 73. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on MSFT!

What's Happening with MSFT Stock Today
Microsoft Corp (MSFT) stock is lower by -0.82% while the S&P 500 is down -0.25% as of 12:52 PM on Wednesday, Feb 21. MSFT is down -$3.31 from the previous closing price of $402.79 on volume of 7,522,520 shares. Over the past year the S&P 500 is up 24.16% while MSFT is up 58.10%. MSFT earned $11.06 a per share in the over the last 12 months, giving it a price-to-earnings ratio of 36.13.
